projects.title: Personal Website
projects.description: A fun front-end portfolio project, using a public themeing option. Hosted on AWS s3 and served by CDN.

education.title: Bachelor's Degree
education.description: Second year of part-time studies for a Bachelor of Science in Computing Information Systems. Currently persuing my degree online due to pandemic reasons.

education.title: Technical Diploma
education.description: Took courses on fundamentals of computing systems.

icons.title: Full-Stack Web Development
icons.description: I have skills and experience to develop full-stack web applications and services in a variety of technologies. My knowledge area for full-stack apps include HTML/CSS/JS, Java (+ Spring Framework), NodeJS (+ Express), Serverless (+ AWS Lambda), PHP (+ Laravel/Symfony), React (+ Redux), and Ruby on Rails. I'm able to create and maintain APIs, web servers, and dockerised environments.

icons.title: Database Systems
icons.description: I have a detailed level of understanding relational database management systems. I have experience with normalisation and a wide range of SQL languages, most notably MySQL/MariaDB, and NoSQL such as MongoDB and Redis. I also have the know-how to implement and use databases in software applications and RESTful APIs.

experience.title: Technical Analyst
responsibilities: Providing system support for all environments including our production teams
Working on technical implementation of apps and infrastructure
Being involved in with larger in-house projects to meet our customer's requirements
Supporting the creation of standardised documentation
Developing skills and understanding of Maximus Canada's tech estate and the process
Developing, testing and supporting current systems
